from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit, current_timestamp, when
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

spark = SparkSession.builder \
    .appName("Raw_to_confirm_scd_type2") \
    .config("spark.sql.extensions", "io.delta.sql.DeltaSparkSessionExtension") \
    .config("spark.sql.catalog.spark_catalog", "org.apache.spark.sql.delta.catalog.DeltaCatalog") \
    .getOrCreate()

blob_account_name = "isourcedev11282024"
blob_container_name = "raw-dev"

token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("az_isource_blob")

spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)

source_path = "wasbs://raw-dev@isourcedev11282024.blob.core.windows.net/EXPORT_PRODUCT_INFO.parquet"
target_path = "abfss://confirm@azdevsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/confirm_Product_Info.delta"

incoming_data = spark.read.parquet(source_path)

if DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, target_path):
    target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_path)
    target_data = target_table.toDF()
else:
    print("Target Delta table does not exist, creating new table.")
    target_data = spark.createDataFrame([], incoming_data.schema.add("start_date", "timestamp").add("end_date", "timestamp").add("is_current", "boolean"))

incoming_data = incoming_data.withColumn("start_date", current_timestamp()) \
                             .withColumn("end_date", lit(None).cast("timestamp")) \
                             .withColumn("is_current", lit(True))

merged_data = incoming_data.alias("src").join(
    target_data.alias("tgt"),
    col("src.productID") == col("tgt.productID"),
    "full_outer"
)

final_data = merged_data.withColumn(
    "action",
    when(col("tgt.productID").isNull(), lit("INSERT"))  # New record
    .when(
        (col("src.ListPrice") != col("tgt.ListPrice")) |
        (col("src.Size") != col("tgt.Size")),
        lit("UPDATE")  # Changed record
    ).otherwise(lit("NO_ACTION"))  # No change
)

expired_records = final_data.filter(col("action") == "UPDATE") \
    .select(
        col("tgt.productID"),
        col("tgt.ListPrice"),
        col("tgt.Size"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        current_timestamp().alias("end_date"),
        lit(False).alias("is_current")
    )

new_records = final_data.filter(col("action").isin("INSERT", "UPDATE")) \
    .select(
        col("src.productID"),
        col("src.ListPrice"),
        col("src.Size"),
        current_timestamp().alias("start_date"),
        lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("end_date"),
        lit(True).alias("is_current")
    )

unchanged_records = final_data.filter(col("action") == "NO_ACTION") \
    .select(
        col("tgt.productID"),
        col("tgt.ListPrice"),
        col("tgt.Size"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        col("tgt.end_date"),
        col("tgt.is_current")
    )

final_dim_table = expired_records.union(new_records).union(unchanged_records)

final_dim_table.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(target_path)

%%sql
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS confirm.confirm_Product_Info
USING DELTA
Location 'abfss://confirm@azdevsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/confirm_Product_Info.delta'

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit, current_timestamp, when
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

spark = SparkSession.builder \
    .appName("Raw_to_confirm_scd_type2") \
    .config("spark.sql.extensions", "io.delta.sql.DeltaSparkSessionExtension") \
    .config("spark.sql.catalog.spark_catalog", "org.apache.spark.sql.delta.catalog.DeltaCatalog") \
    .getOrCreate()

blob_account_name = "isourcedev11282024"
blob_container_name = "raw-dev"

token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("az_isource_blob")

spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)

source_path = "wasbs://raw-dev@isourcedev11282024.blob.core.windows.net/EXPORT_PRODUCT_INFO.parquet"
target_path = "abfss://confirm@azdevsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/confirm_Product_Info.delta"

incoming_data = spark.read.parquet(source_path)

if DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, target_path):
    target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_path)
    target_data = target_table.toDF()
else:
    print("Target Delta table does not exist, creating new table.")
    target_data = spark.createDataFrame([], incoming_data.schema.add("start_date", "timestamp").add("end_date", "timestamp").add("is_current", "boolean"))

incoming_data = incoming_data.withColumn("start_date", current_timestamp()) \
                             .withColumn("end_date", lit(None).cast("timestamp")) \
                             .withColumn("is_current", lit(True))

merged_data = incoming_data.alias("src").join(
    target_data.alias("tgt"),
    col("src.productID") == col("tgt.productID"),
    "full_outer"
)

final_data = merged_data.withColumn(
    "action",
    when(col("tgt.productID").isNull(), lit("INSERT"))  # New record
    .when(
        (col("src.ListPrice") != col("tgt.ListPrice")) |
        (col("src.Size") != col("tgt.Size")),
        lit("UPDATE")  # Changed record
    ).otherwise(lit("NO_ACTION"))  # No change
)

expired_records = final_data.filter(col("action") == "UPDATE") \
    .select(
        col("tgt.productID"),
        col("tgt.ListPrice"),
        col("tgt.Size"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        current_timestamp().alias("end_date"),
        lit(False).alias("is_current")
    )

new_records = final_data.filter(col("action").isin("INSERT", "UPDATE")) \
    .select(
        col("src.productID"),
        col("src.ListPrice"),
        col("src.Size"),
        current_timestamp().alias("start_date"),
        lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("end_date"),
        lit(True).alias("is_current")
    )

unchanged_records = final_data.filter(col("action") == "NO_ACTION") \
    .select(
        col("tgt.productID"),
        col("tgt.ListPrice"),
        col("tgt.Size"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        col("tgt.end_date"),
        col("tgt.is_current")
    )

final_dim_table = expired_records.union(new_records).union(unchanged_records)

final_dim_table.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(target_path)
